text:
How Far You Have Come
You made it. Well done. Take a moment and look back at how far you have come. You now
know:
 About the promise of neural networks and deep learning methods in general for time series
forecasting.
 How to transform time series data in order to train a supervised learning algorithm, such
as deep learning methods.
 How to develop baseline forecasts using naive and classical methods by which to determine
whether forecasts from deep learning models have skill or not.
